item.title: STA 479 2.0 Special Topics in Statistics
item.description: Here's your roadmap for the semester! Class materials will be added on the day of the class. Week 1: Introduction to data visualization Week 2: Scientific design choices in data visualization Week 3: Introduction to the grammar of graphics Week 4: Introduction to the ggplot2 package Week 5: Create different types of static graphics with ggplot2 Week 6: Higher-dimensional displays and special structurs in graphics Week 7: Visualisation of high-dimensional data
